pageProduct.name: Plunkett NS Working Hands Intensive 150g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

NS Working Hands is an intensive, non-greasy, non-slip hand repair treatment that absorbs instantly to restore dry, cracked, calloused or split working hands.

NS Working Hands is an intensive repair treatment for hard-working hands. Dry, damaged and irritated hands are nourished and repaired and a unique protective shield guards against further damage, even through hand washing. Absorbs quickly so hands get back to work, fast. Kaolin, a natural clay mineral stops hands feeling slippery, Vitamin E, Honey, Allantoin and Rosehip promote healing, Lactic Acid gently exfoliates and removes dead skin and callouses. Lemon Myrtle Oil provides an uplifting, gender neutral scentNS Working Hands is an intensive hand repair treatment for hard working hands. Dry, damaged and irritated hands are nourished and repaired and a unique protective shield guards against further damage, even with hand washing. NS Working Hands absorbs quickly, is non-greasy and non-slip so hands can get back to work fast. Kaolin, a natural clay mineral stops hands feeling slippery, Vitamin E, Honey, Allantoin and Rosehip promote healing, Lactic Acid gently exfoliates and removes dead skin and callouses. Lemon Myrtle Oil provides an uplifting scent. Does not contain petro-chemicals, parabens, colours or fragrances.

Guaranteed relief for: -
Work-damaged hands, Very dry cracked hands, Rough, calloused hands, Frequently washed hands, Hands irritated by gloves, Split or cracked fingers, Perfect for tradies, hospitality workers, health care professionals and more.

Suitable For: Guaranteed relief for: - Work-damaged hands, Very dry cracked hands, Rough, calloused hands, Frequently washed hands, Hands irritated by gloves, Split or cracked fingers, Perfect for tradies, hospitality workers, health care professionals and more.

Size: 150g

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Store below 30° C

Ingredients

Purified Water*, Cetearyl Alcohol*, Urea*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride*, Dimethicone, Glycerin*, Ceteth-20*, Lactic Acid*, Sodium PCA*, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rose Hip)*, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Allantoin*, Tocopheryl (Vitamin E) Acetate*, Panthenol (Vitamin B5)*, Honey*, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Aloe Vera) Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Pomelo Grapefruit) Seed Oil*, Backhousia Citriodora (Lemon Myrtle) Oil*, Silica*, Kaolin*, Xanthan Gum*, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Iodopropynyl Methocarbamate.
*Naturally Derived, Organic or Synthesised Natural Ingredients.

Active Ingredients: Urea, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Lactic Acid, Sodium PCA, Rosehip Oil, Grape Seed Oil, Allantoin, Vitamin E, Vitamin B5, Honey, Aloe Vera, Grapefruit Seed Oil, Silica, Kaolin.

Directions

Apply to dry skin 3 times a day or as needed. Use before bedtime as this is the most effective time for restoring severely dry skin. Concentrated formula - a little goes a long way.
